original_text: The weight of all the rings was 20 kilograms. They also had valuable silver images and jewels. They had valuable clothes that the kings of Midian wore and necklaces from the camels.
korean_text: 기드온이 요청한 금 귀고리의 무게가 금 천칠백 세겔이요 그 외에 또 초승달 장식들과 패물과 미디안 왕들이 입었던 자색 의복과 또 그 외에 그들의 낙타 목에 둘렀던 사슬이 있었더라

sentences.original_text: The weight of all the rings was 20 kilograms.
They also had valuable silver images
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 귀중한 은상을 가지고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: that the kings of Midian wore
